definition: good medicine/effective prescription/fig. good plan/effective strategy
good/very/very much

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
surname Fang

sentences.english: It is perhaps the best simple recipe for promoting long-run growth in American living standards.
sentences.chinese: 这可能是促进美国人生活水平长期发展的一剂良方。

sentences.english: The cure for triangulation is trust and intimacy.
sentences.chinese: 互相信任与亲密无间是根治第三方卷入的良方。

sentences.english: This is what we hear when you pray for a cure.
sentences.chinese: 当你们为治愈良方而祈祷时，我们听到的是这句话。

sentences.english: A clever marketing promotion pulled from the pizza industry?
sentences.chinese: 还是从比萨产业学来的市场宣传良方？

sentences.english: To this, many people lament their limited wits.
sentences.chinese: 对此，许多人因苦无良方而兴叹。

sentences.english: What effective prescription to have to you can control child have a bowel movement incontinent?
sentences.chinese: 有没有什么良方可以治小孩大便失禁？

sentences.english: Facing honor, don't calculate gain or loss, but be restrained.
sentences.chinese: 面对荣耀时，不要患得患失，要以克制为良方。

sentences.english: Scientists are pushing themselves to the limits in research for an AIDS skiller.
sentences.chinese: 科学家正在极力的研究治疗艾滋病的良方。

sentences.english: During that time I simply hanging out at the online search freckle recipe.
sentences.chinese: 我那段时间简直是整天泡在网上寻觅祛斑良方。

sentences.english: The drink is also a heat sheshecao Qudu recipe.
sentences.chinese: 而蛇舌草饮也是清热祛毒的良方。

sentences.english: The article holds that health travel is the good prescription to clear up the third state.
sentences.chinese: 本文认为，健康旅游是消解第三状态的良方。

sentences.english: Temping is a great way to build contacts.
sentences.chinese: 工，是建立人际关系的良方。

sentences.english: Sports and revolution ardor were recommended for mental health.
sentences.chinese: 运动和革命热情被当作精神健康的良方。

sentences.english: Vegetarianism is an antidote to all of these unnecessary tragedies.
sentences.chinese: 素食主义是免于所有这些不必要悲剧的一个良方。

sentences.english: It is good therapy, a road to happiness.
sentences.chinese: 它是一剂良方，通向幸福之路。

sentences.english: Dr.Watson is great on exercise as a cure for obesity.
sentences.chinese: 沃森医生把运动看做是治疗肥胖症的良方。

definition: good medicine/panacea/fig. a good solution/a good remedy (e.g. to a social problem)
good plan/good idea
secret recipe
folk remedy/home remedy
to relieve pain/analgesic
effective cure, miracle medicine (idiom); fig. wonder-cure for all problems/panacea/elixir
(of medicine) to use specifically for the treatment of
prescription
to take radical measures/to get to the root (of a problem etc)
to bring under permanent control/to effect a radical cure
good doctor/skilled doctor
correct diagnosis/to prescribe the right cure for an illness/to suit the medicine to the illness
lit. the disease is cured the moment the medicine is taken (idiom)/fig. (of a medical treatment) to give instant results/(of a solution or method) highly effective
a tried and tested medical prescription
to treat only the symptoms but not the root cause
to have the desired effect
